Name: Dead District: Survival
About the game: ABOUT DEAD DISTRICT Dead District is a multiplayer and single-player survival sandbox game in an open world where the player has a wide range of options. The action of the game takes place on an island with various dangers such as traps, wild animals, infected, survivors, ready to kill in order to survive! Embark on an exciting journey, build a shelter, defend yourself, team up with other players! The player has a choice of 4 characters. KEY FEATURES: Multiplayer Mission system Character Health, Hunger, Thirst, Energy Weather System Building System Skill System Driving Level System Open World Crafting Fighting Farming Gathering Resources Enemies Mining and refining of ores Day and Night Cycle
